component.name: FontraPak
component.summary: Standalone desktop build of the Fontra font editor

description.p: FontraPak is a cross-platform desktop application bundling the open-source, browser-based Fontra font editor. Fontra is developed by Black[Foundry] and Just van Rossum with support from Google Fonts.

Fontra focuses on variable font technology and advanced workflows for large font projects such as CJK, offering deeper variable font integration than traditional editors. As a standalone package, FontraPak allows easy installation and use outside the browser, bringing the full editing environment to your desktop.
